Admin Login

{{ errorMessage }}
import { Component } from '@angular/core'; import { Router } from '@angular/router'; @Component({ selector: 'app-login', // Combine all imports in one array templateUrl: './login.component.html', styleUrls: ['./login.component.scss'], }) export class LoginComponent { username: string = ''; password: string = ''; errorMessage: string = ''; constructor(private router: Router) {} onLogin(): void { // Simulate admin login with hardcoded username and password if (this.username === 'admin' && this.password === 'admin') { localStorage.setItem('isAdminAuthenticated', 'true'); this.router.navigate(['/admin-dashboard']); // Redirect to admin dashboard } else { this.errorMessage = 'Invalid credentials. Please try again.'; } } }
